original_text: Saul made his camp beside the road on the hill of Hakilah facing Jeshimon, but David stayed in the wilderness. When he saw that Saul had followed him there,
korean_text: 사울이 광야 앞 하길라 산 길 가에 진 치니라 다윗이 광야에 있더니 사울이 자기를 따라 광야로 들어옴을 알고

sentences.original_text: Saul made his camp beside the road
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 길 옆에 그의 진영을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: but David stayed in the wilderness
When he saw that Saul had followed him there
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사울이 그곳까지 자신을 따라왔다는 것을 보았을 때
